Shen Zhen Yuyuanxin Electronics Technology Ltd
Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing
shen zhen, guang dong
14 followers
About us
Shenzhen Yuyuanxin Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 1999.We are a professional manufacturer of various game accessories.The headquater of our company is located in Guanlan Town,Longhua District,Shenzhen.
We are a company converging with Market Reaserch,Product Design,Production & Sales to offer OEM/ODM Service.We specializd in the production of many popular video game accessories for Nintendo Switch,Sony PS4 Series,Xbox One Series ect.Our major products are:Game Controllers,Light Guns,Steering Wheels,Dancing Carpet,Remote Control,Memory Cards,Switch Box,Cables,Cases,Chargers and Battery Packs ect.
Our company sticked to the independent research and development since we estalished.Our management group are well educated,80% of them are bachelor degree or above.With a great design team over 30 people, we acquired hundreds of design patents.
We created our own brand"DOBE"and kept long-term good relationships with many famous worldwide suppliers and distributors.With modern standard production workshop,clean and well-organized warehouse,professional sales team,which enable us export our products to the global market like Europe,USA,Japan,Korea,Southeast Asia,Australia,Middle East,ect.
In order to meet the diverse needs of the market,high quality of the product and high efficiency of work.We consistently optimize and improve our management system.To make better quality control,we certified by SGS & ISO9001:2008,followed ISO quality management system & 6S management system(Seiri,Seiton,Seiso,Seiketsu,Shitsuke,Safety)and company-wide quality control (CWQC);To make better informatization construction,we introduced the ERP management system system; To fulfill social responsibility,we popularized SA8000 Social Responsibility Management System. All these enable our company to a better and higher level.
With 19 years'concentration,details define quality and professional win the trust.We constantly adhere to the business policy of high qu

results.title: Company Profile - DOBE Videogame Accessories
results.content: Company profile. Founded in 1999, Shenzhen yuyuanxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. is a modern manufacturer specializing in the production and sales of game machine accessories. At present, the company has more than 1000 kinds of products. The company is in the leading position in the field of professional video game peripheral accessory ...
results.raw_content:
Company profile
Founded in 1999, Shenzhen yuyuanxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. is a modern manufacturer specializing in the production and sales of game machine accessories. At present, the company has more than 1000 kinds of products. The company is in the leading position in the field of professional video game peripheral accessory products in China. Its headquarter is located in building 11, Guihua Industrial Zone, Guihua community, Guanlan Town, Longhua New District, Shenzhen.
Technology and development
Our company integrates market research, product R & D, design, production and sales, specializing in the production of market mainstream video game console (such as Nintendo switch, Sony PS4 series, Microsoft Xbox one series host, etc.) peripheral accessories products, the main products are: handle, seat charge, light gun, steering wheel, remote control, memory card, converter, wire, storage bag, charger, battery pack, etc .
Team and strength
Since its establishment, the company has always adhered to the principle of independent research and development. More than 80% of the management personnel have university degree or above. There are more than 30 R & D teams and hundreds of design patents. It has modern standard production workshops, clean and orderly large warehouses, professional sales teams, global registered independent brand Dobe, and many well-known suppliers, distributors and customers both at home and abroad Customers maintain good cooperative relationship and export products to Europe, America, Japan and South Korea, Southeast Asia, Australia and the Middle East and other global markets.
Management idea
In order to meet the diversified needs of the market and meet the requirements of high quality and efficiency of customers, the company has continuously optimized and improved its management system, followed the ISO quality management system, passed the ISO9001:2008 system certification of SGS general standard company, implemented 6S management (sorting, rectifying, cleaning, literacy, safety) and all staff quality management, and implemented and introduced the enterprise in the information construction ERP management system of resource planning, promotion and implementation of SA8000 social responsibility management system in fulfilling social responsibility, etc. make the company move towards a higher level. Twenty years of focus, details make quality, professional win trust, we have always been adhering to the good quality, sincere service, commitment to the business policy.
Qualification certificate
